title: UI Training Materials

media.caption: find out if your website is broken
media.alt: Screenshot of the Is This Website Broken website

media.caption: get squishy on the Respond site
media.alt: Screenshot of the Respond training website

overview: Sometimes I build things, and other times I build things to teach others about best practices for building things. "Is This Website Broken" was built to promote the importance of content accessibility, while "Respond." was used as part of a series of presentations on the benefits and challenges of responsive design.
stack: Good ol' HTML, CSS, and Javascript
